xal.extension.twissobserver

Enum PHASEPLANE

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<PHASEPLANE>
      • xal.extension.twissobserver.PHASEPLANE
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<PHASEPLANE>

    public enum PHASEPLANE
extends java.lang.Enum<PHASEPLANE>
    Enumeration of the mechanical motion phase planes for use in identifying the families of Courant-Snyder parameters. The enumeration also contains useful methods for converting between covariance space representations.
    Since:
    Jul 20, 2012
    See Also:
    PhaseMatrix, CorrelationMatrix

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      HOR
      Horizontal phase plane
      LNG
      Longitudinal phase plane
      VER
      Vertical phase plane

      • constructCovariance

        public static CovarianceMatrix constructCovariance(Jama.Matrix vecMmtsHor,
                                                   Jama.Matrix vecMmtsVer,
                                                   Jama.Matrix vecMmtsLng)
        Packs the second moments in the three vectors into a properly formatted covariance matrix.
        Parameters:
        vecMmtsHor - vector of horizontal second moments
        vecMmtsVer - vector of vertical second moments
        vecMmtsLng - vector of longitudinal second moments
        Returns:
        the covariance matrix with the given moments as elements
        Since:
        Aug 31, 2012

      • getCovIndexOffset

        public int getCovIndexOffset()
        Returns the index offset into the covariance matrix for this phase plane. This is the diagonal index of the top left element of the 2×2 diagonal block that this enumeration constant represents.
        Returns:
        index offset identifying the block diagonal within the covariance matrix
        Since:
        Mar 27, 2013

      • getStandardBasisSize

        public int getStandardBasisSize()
        Returns the cardinality of the standard basis set.
        Returns:
        number of standard basis set matrices
        Since:
        Mar 28, 2013

      • getStandardBasis

        public PhaseMatrix getStandardBasis(int indBasis)
                             throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException

        Returns the standard basis matrix for the given index. There are four of these matrices for each phase plane. They provide an independent vector representation of the 4×4 diagonal block occupied by this phase space within phase matrices. Restricting to one block diagonal we have


        e0≡| 1 0 |
        | 0 0 |

        e1≡| 0 1 |
        | 0 0 |

        e2≡| 0 0 |
        | 1 0 |

        e3≡| 0 0 |
        | 0 1 |

        The argument indBasis is the index i of ei.
        Parameters:
        indBasis - The index of the basis vector
        Returns:
        The basis vector in covariance space as described above
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - The given index is greater than 3
        Since:
        Mar 27, 2013

      • getCovariantBasisSize

        public int getCovariantBasisSize()
        Returns the cardinality of the covariance basis set.
        Returns:
        number of covariance basis set matrices
        Since:
        Mar 28, 2013

      • getCovarianceBasis

        public CovarianceMatrix getCovarianceBasis(int indBasis)
                                    throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException

        Returns the covariance basis matrix for the given index. There are three of these matrices for each phase plane. They provide a vector representation of the 4×4 block diagonal of the covariance matrix occupied by this phase plane. Because of the symmetry of the covariance matrix, there are only three independent basis vectors. Restricting attention to one block diagonal we have


        c0≡| 1 0 |
        | 0 0 |

        c1≡| 0 1 |
        | 1 0 |

        c2≡| 0 0 |
        | 0 1 |

        The argument indBasis is the index i of ci.
        Parameters:
        indBasis - The index of the basis vector
        Returns:
        The basis vector in covariance space as described above
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - The given index is greater than 3
        Since:
        Mar 27, 2013

      • extractBeamSize

        public double extractBeamSize(Measurement msmt)
        Returns the beam size field corresponding to this phase plane from the given measurement data structure.
        Parameters:
        msmt - data structure of beam size measurements for each phase plane
        Returns:
        the beam size measurement for this phase plane
        Since:
        Mar 28, 2013

      • extractCovarianceVector

        public Jama.Matrix extractCovarianceVector(CovarianceMatrix matCov)
        Extracts the (3) moments for the given phase plane from the covariance matrix and return them as a 3 × 1 vector. For example, for the horizontal plane we return (<x2>, <xx'>, <x'2>)T.
        Parameters:
        matCov - the covariance matrix containing all the first and second order moments
        Returns:
        vector of moments for this phase plane
        Since:
        Mar 27, 2013
